entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
